key.name: display-local
key.summary: How to display local DNS-SD services
key.description: How DNS-SD services are displayed in the "network:///" location. Possible values are "merged", "separate" (the Local Network folder) and "disabled".

key.summary: Extra domains to look for DNS-SD services in
